Diamond::
She slithered into the lab and saw Vamprah and Devilduer.  She hissed 
a little to let them know that she was there.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vamprah/Najah/Alliance's Computer
> 
> Vamprah::
> 
> Daimond's vemon effects was going, enough to let at
> Vamprah start againg her fight to wake up and come to
> normal.
> 
> She noticed that a hand took her gun of her, she
> didn't resist because her mind was so confuse and her
> body still fairly weak.
> 
> She slowly tried to open her eyes and saw a male-bot,
> she wasn't sure but she thought that she had seen him
> before, and she had been smelled his energy
> signature...
> 
> She tried to stand up an suppoting her arms on floor
> she did abig sfort... But her forces failed and she
> couldn't move.
> 
> She contining on floor trying to continue cocious
> beacuse she felt that she might fell in stasis lock in
> every moment again.
> 
> She just could saw at the male-bot and ler her
> insticst act.
> 
> ::Najah::
> 
> Najah followed  at Zardus, wondering himself what
> Zardus would like of him.
> 
> "Excusssssme my massster... "  Najah stammered trying
> to find the right words "I wassss wondering, that...
> YOu sssee... I..."
> 
> Right words didn't come to Najah and he was abit
> nervoust  cause he didn't know the right mannersto
> speak with his leader.
> --- Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > Sorry if this post is quick, I got 3 mins before
> > class.
> > 
> >
> ::Zardus/WarMachine/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::
> > 
> > Aproaching the lab, Zardus stops as he recieves a
> > transmission, 
> > supposedly from a ship. He frowns, looking at his
> > wrist comp and 
> > scanning through the reports. That wasn't right...
> > The ship that had 
> > exploded had emitted almost no energy, not enough to
> > even register on 
> > more than visuals. The pods seemed real though..
> > 
> > "WarMachine," he says into his comm, "There are a
> > few pods near the 
> > base, could you retreave them?"
> > 
> > With that, Zardus walks into the lab. "Strap down
> > anything fragile," 
> > he says to Lady Hawk and Squizzy, "We're moving to a
> > new base. Or 
> > rather moving this base to it."
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > WarMachine nods as he recieves Zardus' transmission.
> > "On my way," he 
> > says, heading for the pods.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Bloodystrike waits for Life to answer.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Reptilica enters the bridge of the Alliance base,
> > sitting down at the 
> > scanners, frowning as he recieves the transmission.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > DevilDuer frowns as he sees the gun in Vamprah's
> > hand. Reaching out 
> > carefully, he tries to take the gun from her.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4"
> > <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Lady Hawk got an idea, maybe having an assistant
> > wasn't such a bad 
> > idea.
> > > 
> > > "Say, you wouldn't know how to find CR information
> > for a repaired 
> > bot would
> > > you? These systems just aren't up to the standards
> > meant for a bot 
> > of my
> > > status." She was hoping that Squizzy could gain
> > the information she 
> > couldn't
> > > find.
> > > 
> > > "I could make it worth your effort to help me gain
> > the information I 
> > need."
> > > Lady Hawk knew that a bot with the information
> > she'd given would 
> > have to
> > > fully understand the technology involved. Squizzy
> > did which left two
> > > options, either take her back to Veratis when she
> > went, or have a 
> > late
> > > supper
> > 
> >
